inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script type: File Path or Inline

inputs.name: files
inputs.label: Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Kusto scripts to execute. See [file matching patterns](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/build-release/tasks/file-matching-patterns?view=vsts) for syntax, (multiple paterns should be semi-column ";" separated).

inputs.name: script
inputs.label: Script
inputs.defaultValue:
# Write your command here.
.show version 
# Use the environment variables input below to pass secret variables to this script.
# Do not add empty lines, supports only single command

inputs.name: teamProject
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name in which the Repository exists.

inputs.name: repositoryName
inputs.label: Repository name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Repository name in which query file exists.

inputs.name: branchName
inputs.label: Branch name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name in which query file exists. example, master

inputs.name: queryFileFullPath
inputs.label: Query file full path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Query (csl) file full path in the given branch. example, /MyKustoQueries/KustoQuery.csl

inputs.name: singleCommand
inputs.label: Single Kusto command per file
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, empty lines are considered part of commands and each script file must only contain a single command. When unchecked, empty lines are treated as command separators and multiple commands can appear in script files.

inputs.name: keepFormatting
inputs.label: Keep csl formatting, indentation and comments
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, the runner will not trim the line indentation or remove comments from the csl file (independent comments or comments before a command will still be ignored)

inputs.name: parallelCommands
inputs.label: Commands are called in parallel
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, commands in the script execute in parallel. When unchecked, commands are call sequencialy (one-by-one).

inputs.name: waitForOperation
inputs.label: Wait for long Async Admin commands to complete (polling ".show operations <Guid>")
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, empty lines are considered part of commands and each script file must only contain a single command. When unchecked, empty lines are treated as command separators and multiple commands can appear in script files.

inputs.name: waitTimeout
inputs.label: Wait Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum time to wait for long running commands (0 = no timeout).

inputs.name: ShouldRetry
inputs.label: Retry Unsuccessful Long Running Operation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retry Operation based on status

inputs.name: MaxRetry
inputs.label: Maximum Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of times to Retry Operation (0 = retry forever)

inputs.name: kustoUrls
inputs.label: Endpoint URLs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Semicolon-separated list of URLs of the Kusto clusters and databases to deploy to, each formatted as 'https://[YourCluster].kusto.windows.net:443?DatabaseName=[YourDatabase]'.

inputs.name: customAuth
inputs.label: Use Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use Kusto Service Endpoint.

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use an Existing Kusto Service endpoint, or create a new one

inputs.name: aadClientId
inputs.label: AAD App Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GUID of the AAD App authorized to run admin commands on the Kusto database.

inputs.name: ResourceURI
inputs.label: Resource URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Resource providing the OAuth token for the command (base url of your cluster) .

inputs.name: aadClientSecret
inputs.label: AAD App Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The client secret used to authenticate with AAD.

inputs.name: tenantId
inputs.label: AAD Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The AAD Tenant ID (<Org>.onmicrosoft.com or tenantID Guid)

inputs.name: OutputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the variable name for the (last) command response output 
when "last response only" in unchecked multiple variables will be created 
in the format of <VariableName>_<index>
(to use in downstream tasks - value is in JSON format)

inputs.name: OutputFile
inputs.label: Output File
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the File name for the (last) command response output 
when "last response only" in unchecked multiple variables will be created 
in the format of <VariableName>_<index>
(to use in downstream tasks - value is in JSON format)

inputs.name: LastResponse
inputs.label: Save last response only

inputs.name: serialDelay
inputs.label: Serial Execution Delay
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delay (in milliseconds, 0 - 5000) between serial execution

inputs.name: pollingInterval
inputs.label: Polling Interval (Sec.)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Long Running Operation Polling Interval (in Seconds, 15 - 900)

inputs.name: workDir
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root Path to search the *.csl files

inputs.name: skipValidation
inputs.label: Insert 'skipvalidation'
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Insert 'skipvalidation' flag to all comands to avoid 
failures due to unmet dependencies.
